alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 21 at 8:41PM EST until further notice by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... Iroquois River at Iroquois affecting Newton and Iroquois Counties. Kankakee River at Shelby affecting Lake IN and Newton Counties. Kankakee River at Dunns Bridge affecting Jasper and Porter Counties. For the Kankakee River...including Dunns Bridge, Shelby, Wilmington...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kankakee River at Dunns Bridge. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flooding begins of low lying agricultural areas near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 9.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning and continue rising to a crest of 11.0 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: These forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well as forecast precipitation 48 hours into the future. Changes to the rainfall forecast, or any additional rainfall after 48 hours, may cause changes to these river forecasts. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/Chicago and water.weather.gov The next statement is expected Tuesday morning.
